name: Chopper Lander Free
description:
This is a classic arcade style game where you dodge the other aircraft and try to land the chopper safely. You need to try and land the chopper in the area indicated by the arrow and avoid the other aircraft. Some levels have multiple choppers you must land in order to complete the level. Each level has coins you can collect which you can use to buy other chopper designs. While being touched by clouds, raindrops or snowflakes you can’t move and lightning will destroy you. Good luck!

+ Land the chopper safely
+ 11 aircraft to avoid
+ Clouds, raindrops and snow stop your movement
+ Lightning destroys your chopper
+ Storm clouds produce raindrops, snow and lightning
+ Simple innovative gameplay
+ 8 chopper designs to buy
+ Several different level themes
+ Fun candy levels
